content.raw:
I've added a simple test, thought it makes sense to put it in `sdf.cc`[,](http://sdf.cc) and while I was doing that I stumbled upon a presumably obsolete test. Thought I'd take this as an occasion to bring it up whether we should get rid of it, since the Param interface in sdformat has since changed, and such a test would anyway belong into sdformat.

Link to[ jenkins build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any/704/).
